summary: Whisper: implement user profile UI (profile view + edit flow) using existing React + Tailwind frontend and minimal profile-specific integration; user requested executing steps 1–3 of the 5-step plan.
architectural_notes: Backend context: single Motoko canister; stable memory for persistent profile data (backend work not requested yet in steps 1–3).
Scope constraint: implement steps 1–3 only (UI routes, profile view, edit form); avoid unrelated systems.

existing_features.title: Support two profile routes: /profile (read-only profile view) and /profile/edit (edit form). Routing must work with the current popstate-based navigation (no new router dependency) and must be reachable from the existing header/user menu navigation.

Implement the /profile UI to display the core profile fields in a clean, mobile-first layout using existing Tailwind + shadcn components and Whisper styling. The view must include: avatar, display name, username/handle, bio, role/badges, location, join date, contribution stats, external links, and recent activity summary. For any fields not yet available from the backend, render sensible placeholders/empty states without breaking existing functionality.

Implement the /profile/edit UI as an edit form that lets the authenticated user update: display name, bio, avatar upload/removal, external links (1–3), and preferences (at minimum provide UI controls for preferences even if persistence is deferred). The edit page must provide Save/Cancel behavior and route back to /profile on cancel and on successful save.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement Profile page UI showing core fields (avatar, display name, username, bio, role/badges, location, join date, stats, links, activity)
Implement Edit Profile form to update name, bio, avatar, links, and preferences (frontend flow)
